name: Dodgeball (itch) (MysticalGreen)
description: Dodgeball is a quick reaction game where you control a moving ball with the left and right arrow keys. You have to avoid the obstacles and reach the end. There are a total of 15 levels right now, but there are more to come. I myself have never been able to complete this challenging game, so have fun and tell me if you beat it. Also tell me about any bugs/glitches so I can get them fixed as soon as possible.
